definition: falling and rising tone/third tone in modern Mandarin
on top/upon/above/upper/previous/first (of multiple parts)/to climb/to get onto/to go up/to attend (class or university)
see 上聲|上声[shang3 sheng1]
sound/voice/tone/noise/reputation/classifier for sounds

sentences.english: Yangping and Shang tone's tone sandhi can be considered the same.
sentences.chinese: 陽平和上聲的聲調變化卻幾乎一樣。

sentences.english: Economists, of course, are not famed in general for forecasting accuracy.
sentences.chinese: 當然經濟學家往往在預測精確性上聲命不佳。

sentences.english: The sudden sound of footsteps in silence made her blood run cold.
sentences.chinese: 靜寂中突然響起的腳上聲使她感到毛骨悚然。
